resources.string: What Do you want to Change Language ?

The final project is a chance for you to combine and practice everything you learned from this course. You will be making your own Android app - taking it from the idea stage to building out the full app, with an opportunity to publish it in the Google Play store. The goal is to create an educational app that teaches 5 new things to a user on a certain topic of your choice. We want you to be creative about how you accomplish this. Itâ€™s up to you what these 5 things will be and how you want to present this to your user.
